job.title: AI Software Engineer with C#, Azure, and Leadership Skills
job.description:
Logistic AI, a leader in final mile system solutions, is seeking a highly skilled and motivated AI Software Engineer to join our dynamic team. We are looking for a candidate who is proficient in C# and machine learning languages, has a strong background in Azure services, and possesses the leadership skills necessary to educate a team of talented engineers. If you are a self-driven innovator who thrives in a fast-paced environment, we would love to hear from you.

Key Responsibilities:

- Develop and implement advanced AI solutions using C# and machine learning languages.
- Utilize Azure services such as Azure ML Studio and Azure OpenAI to optimize AI projects.
- Mentor a team of engineers, ensuring project milestones and objectives are met.
- Independently manage AI projects from concept to deployment.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI solutions into our existing systems.

Required Skills and Qualifications:

- Strong proficiency in C# and one or more machine learning languages (Python, R, etc.).
- Extensive experience with Azure services, particularly Azure ML Studio and Azure OpenAI.
- Proven leadership experience in educating and working with a team of software engineers.
- Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
- Ability to learn new technologies quickly and work independently.
- Strong project management skills and ability to handle multiple tasks simultaneously.
- A commitment to ethical AI practices.

Preferred Skills:

- Experience in .NET Core, Angular, and Flutter.
- Familiarity with microservices architecture.
- Background in data analysis and model development.

What We Offer:

- An opportunity to work at the forefront of AI technology in a rapidly growing company.
- A collaborative and innovative work environment.
- Competitive compensation and opportunities for professional growth.

questions.question: Describe a challenging AI project you led or contributed to. What was your role, what challenges did you face, and how did you overcome them?
How have you stayed current with the rapidly evolving field of AI and machine learning? Can you give an example of a recent advancement you've incorporated into your work?

Can you describe a project or scenario where you utilized Azure OpenAI Service? Specifically, how did you integrate it into your solution, and what were the key challenges and outcomes of using this service?

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are seeking an experienced AI Software Engineer with strong skills in C#, Azure, and leadership. The project duration is estimated to be 3 to 6 months. 

As an AI Software Engineer, you will be responsible for developing and implementing AI solutions using the .NET Framework, Azure App Service, and Machine Learning. Additionally, you will be leading a team of developers, ensuring successful project delivery.

To apply for this position, please submit a detailed proposal outlining how you can contribute to the project's success. Please include examples of past completed projects that demonstrate your expertise in AI, C#, and Azure. Providing links to these projects will greatly assist in evaluating your suitability for this role.

We look forward to reviewing your proposals and selecting the best candidate for this exciting opportunity.
